function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of COVID-19 prevention measures on construction sites","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementation of COVID-19 prevention measures such as screening, social distancing, and PPE use","Technologies":"COVID-19 testing kits, temperature screening devices, PPE","People":"Construction workers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Construction companies, employers"},{"Description":"Forceful stop-work orders impacting construction projects","Impact":"Decrease in construction activity and economic impact","Mitigation":"Adherence to COVID-19 prevention measures, lobbying for safe operation of construction sites","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technology, lobbying and advocacy tools","People":"Construction workers, unions, industry associations","Owner":"Government, industry associations, unions"},{"Description":"Limited coordination of site deliveries leading to higher contact and potential transmission","Impact":"Greater risk for delivery personnel and construction workers","Mitigation":"Coordination of site deliveries, minimal contact and cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Communication and coordination platforms, minimal contact delivery technologies","People":"Delivery personnel, construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies, delivery companies"}]}
